entry.name: Region Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: regionType
Description: Range shape (cylinder, prism, capsule)

entry.name: Category
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: category
Description: The number on the left side of the name is the priority when multiple action buttons overlap (the closer it is to 0, the higher the priority is displayed).

entry.name: Dummy Poly [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dummyPoly1
Description: Specify the Damipoli ID that is the center of the bottom of the range. If there is no Damipoly or -1 is entered, the center coordinates will be the reference.

entry.name: Dummy Poly [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dummyPoly2
Description: Used only when the range type is a capsule. Additional Damipoly (capsule) that creates a line segment with two Damipoly

entry.name: Radius
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: radius
Description: Radius (cylinder / capsule)

entry.name: Angle
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: angle
Description: Angle (cylinder)

entry.name: Depth
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: depth
Description: Depth (prism)

entry.name: Width
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: width
Description: Width (prism)

entry.name: Height
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: height
Description: Height (cylinder / prism)

entry.name: Base Height Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: baseHeightOffset
Description: How much to raise or lower the Y coordinate of the bottom (cylinder / prism)

entry.name: Angle Check Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: angleCheckType
Description: Angle difference judgment type (cylinder / prism)

entry.name: Allow Angle
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: allowAngle
Description: Allowable angle difference (cylinder / prism)

entry.name: Spot Dummy Poly
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spotDummyPoly
Description: If there is no Damipoli that specifies the Damipoli ID that will be the position of the action spot, or if -1 is entered, the center coordinates will be the reference.

entry.name: Textbox Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: textBoxType
Description: Text box type

entry.name: Invalid for Ride
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isInvalidForRide
Description: If this item is YES, the action button will not appear when riding and no judgment will be made.

entry.name: Greyout for Ride
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isGrayoutForRide
Description: If this item is YES, the action button will be grayed out when riding and no judgment will be made.

entry.name: Invalid for Crouching
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isInvalidForCrouching
Description: If this item is YES, the action button will not appear when crouching, and no judgment will be made.

entry.name: Greyout for Crouching
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isGrayoutForCrouching
Description: If this item is YES, the action button will be grayed out when crouching and no judgment will be made.

entry.name: Text ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: textId
Description: Text ID to display

entry.name: Invalid Flag
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: invalidFlag
Description: If this flag is ON, the action button will not appear and no judgment will be made.

entry.name: Grayout Flag
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: grayoutFlag
Description: If this flag is ON, the action button will be grayed out and no judgment will be made.

entry.name: Override Button ID for Ride
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: overrideActionButtonIdForRide
Description: Replace with this action button ID parameter while riding (-1: No replacement)

entry.name: Execution Invalid Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: execInvalidTime
Description: Invalid time after execution (-infinite by value)
